cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on September 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8630, Legislation to Name United States Post Offices

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 127 (Friday, July 29, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. STANSBURY:
H.R. 8630.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 7
[Page H7540]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 24 - 16.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 400 North Main Street in Belen, New Mexico, as the "U.S. Senator Dennis Chávez Post Office".
